name: grist-mcp-server
description: Production-grade MCP server for Grist API integration with retry logic, rate limiting, and comprehensive error handling
long_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to interact with Grist documents, tables, and records. Features 15 workflow-oriented tools with dual response formats (JSON/Markdown), progressive detail levels, smart context management with 25K character limits, and comprehensive error handling. Supports both Grist Cloud and self-hosted instances.

grist_api_key.title: Grist API Key
grist_api_key.description: Your Grist API key. Visit https://docs.getgrist.com/settings/keys to create one.

grist_base_url.title: Grist Base URL
grist_base_url.description: Base URL for your Grist instance. Use https://docs.getgrist.com for Grist Cloud or your self-hosted URL.
